website_summaries.verdict: Your standard silicone lip plumping cup, but with a sweet cherry twist. This device gets results that last longer than many of its competitors.
pros: These cherry-shaped lip plumping tools are not only cute, but they work
You can choose between a round or oval shape
We loved the oval, as it covers lips without touching much of the skin around the mouth
The effects lasted about 2 hours before starting to fade
cons: Easy to loose suction and have the device fall off
We suggest applying a lip balm on and around your lips to help keep the cup in place

customer_reviews.title: Plump it up
customer_reviews.text: So I just got lip injections and sadly, I was not satisfied and did not feel like dropping another $500. I ran into this on amazon and it works! Gives me the extra boost I need right before going out. Add a bit of lip plumping gloss and you have Kylie Jenner lips. Just don’t suck too hard or you’ll end up giving yourself a hickey...
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Alanis

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: This works!!! It really made my lips full! It will look silly the. Longer you have it in. Let it set and you have some voluptuous lips!!! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very natural looking plumping
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable to use. I have very thin lips and this device allows me to show off my lip products on my live tutorials much better than anything else I've ever used. You can do subtle plumping or dramatic...depending on how much suction you use and how long the device is left on. I love the casing and the product is cute as well! Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: WitchyWyatt

customer_reviews.title: Plumper dupe!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! If you're looking for a dupe for some of the IG lip plumper products, it's perfect and only a 3rd of the price. I started with 30 seconds each lip, and did 3 rounds each. Full effects last about an hour, and still visibly plumper for about 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: melrose427

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I had never used one of these before and I love it. I used the circle (not oval) one for this picture and I'm so satisfied. No bruising or weird marks after, easy to use. Here's my before and after.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Remember to moisturize your lips before and after!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I recommend keeping it on each lip for 3 minutes for a fuller effect. All my girlfriends think I got expensive lip injections! 😏
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I plumped my lips about 4 times - 1 minute apart.I love it! Works great and is simple to use. The plump last a long time and don't have to use it tons of times a day like other plumber's. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carmella Haley

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I love this plumper soo far! This is my 2nd time using it and you can see a very noticeable difference, as I have attached a photo of before and after. Yes it does leave hickey marks around the lips the first couple of times/days doing it, that's expected though as the lips aren't used to that kind of suction. They will gradually become used to it with consistent use, and can easily be covered with a little bit of concealer. It does what it's supposed to do and claims to do! It comes with another model for the lips as well plus two blockers included! I like it, and recommend this product! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Whoever said this thing doesn't work obviously didn't read the directions. If you have a smaller mouth they have a rubber adapter piece to help the suction. I am so happy I got this. Works like a charm! Super pouty sexy lips without injections
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for COVID-19 Masks! 😷
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I am thankful for my Covid-19 mask that covers my lips. I still have bruising after 6 days. Worst product I've tried. Returned immediately. I wish I would have taken more pictures because the one I have doesn't do it any justice. I not only followed ALL instructions, I left the product on for a shorter amount of time and still had the worst bruising I have ever had on my lips. I do NOT recommend this to anyone unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Jansea

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: Edit to add: only worked a few times, now I can't get the same result at all. I'm in LOVE!! The effect lasts several hours and I love being able to choose to do top lip and bottom lip individually. My bottom lip has always been thinner than my top. So, I use more suction on the bottom. The picture shows before, then 1 minute, 2 minutes and 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Castro

customer_reviews.title: It looks like I received lip injections
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well..It looks like I received lip injections. They stay for a few hours and I had no side effect so it seems gentle on the lips. I wouldn't recommend for daily use, but going out it made my lips probably a good 8xs size increase. I have smaller lips so I even wanted less plump. I do like that because of this, I was able to adjust the size I want per how long I leave in suction. A must have beauty tool in your collection. Worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B

customer_reviews.title: It’s been 4 days and my lips are still purple
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even cover my purple lips unless I use dark red lipstick which I’m not going to wear when I’m not wearing any other make up or during the day time (in the spring especially). I don’t even bruise easily but this thing sure did bruise my lips. I wish I could give it a negative rating as I walk around embarrassed by my purple lips
customer_reviews.author: BrandiNichol

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have very little hope that this would work but decided to give it a shot. WOW! The instructions are super easy to understand and I got the plumper right on. The suction is STRONG and I was only able to keep it on for a minute the first time. Tried again after a couple hours and left it on for 2 minutes. 10/10 highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: valley1211

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works well
customer_reviews.text: Cool little lip plumper. Not long lasting results but it will plump your pout for sure.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and just spend a bit more on the candylipz product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cheap alternate version of the candylipz cherry travel lip plumper. Well, you get what you pay for. This product, although very pretty presentation, absolutely sucks.. And not in a good way. Barely works and whatever plumbers you get from it goes away very quickly. Better of spending the 29 bucks on candylipz.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Kinda looks like I have herpes now
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product twice, a few days apart. After the first use, bruises surrounded my mouth and purple dots remained on my lips for days. I had read that this is normal after first use and tried the product again after bruising had gone away. The pictures included in this review are the result. Maybe I’m using it wrong, but I definitely did not achieve the “sexy pout” as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: This product bruised my lips and underneath my bottom lip. It hurt while doing it also. I only did it for the 2 minutes it said...I should have went with my gut and took it off when it started hurting and maybe I wouldn't have bruised, but I only followed the directions. It definitely plumped my lips...but in a way that it looked like I was stung by a bee or had an allergic reaction. Not a safe product in my opinion or worth purple lips just for plumpness.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia A. DiMarco

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the real deal...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned an actual Candylipz, and after years the center lip divider snapped. I figured I’d try this (mostly because I didn’t want to pay for the shipping on another Candylipz). By comparison this one is so soft and has almost no suctioning power. Have yet to be able to get it to to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works!!! But be warned it will make your lips huge! The first time I did it I did it for four minutes and I looked like Daffy duck. But I love it and will definitely continue using this! I am no longer considering with injections.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd lip plumper product I’ve owned , the other 2 work great so I figured, hey, let’s try this “fancy” lip plumper . It’s -terrible- little to no suction, barely plumps your lips, the material is too hard to squeeze to get suction. You expect it to be soft and squishy but it’s like a semi-hard plastic. I tried multiple times and couldn’t get anything out of it, I just ended up throwing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t don’t don’t
customer_reviews.text: My friend tried this after I did as it did nothing for me. She broke out! Her lips, above her lips alllll red and swollen and bruised!!!!!! I have the video. Poor thing!
customer_reviews.author: J. Franklyn

customer_reviews.title: Really good, results lasted a while
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good lipplumper. They're cute and easy to clean. I dont have tiny lips but they are smaller. This helped plump them and they stayed plump for a couple hours. They didn't bruise like some plumpers do. The only issue I had was they slid off my lips unless I put them on super tight.
customer_reviews.author: aliciam

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: This works. I have plumb lips that have deflated over the years. But this is good if you use it in conjunction with a good lip plumbing lipstick. That way they stay plumb longer. It doesn't hurt but you have to get the knack for getting it right in the middle. I think this is a pretty good product. You can control how much suction you want. More or less.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Primazon

customer_reviews.title: The effect is very good, I will recommend it to my friends
customer_reviews.text: I love it!I'm so excited.This stuff is amazing, it really works!First of all, the packaging is very attractive.It is comfortable to use without bruising.It's really worth it.And it's easy to apply.I did it once, then waited a few minutes to do it again.After the second lipstick, I noticed that my lips were fuller.And it has two shaped lips. If you suck hard, your lips will hurt. Just breathe in a little bit of air and relax, and you'll get a nice lip shape!I can't believe it.I'm officially addicted!It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Bart Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, I have an average lip size but after using it they're slighty above average. Although it's temporary it looks good in pictures 👌
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. I have watched videos and re-read the instructions multiple times. I believe it does not work well due to the quality of the silicone. It is not sturdy enough to allow suction properly. I’m unsure how to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica VanMeer

customer_reviews.title: Fast lip plumper
customer_reviews.text: I love my lip plumper!!! Peach lip plumper changed my life!! All I can say is wow! I just started using it today so I can't wait to see what the long term effects will be. I'm so in love!!! The temporary fuller after several minutes and last about half an hours. I would keep using it everyday. And use 2 time every 5 minutes, never do much more time per time per day to avoid the bruise like the newbie have done.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Meh... got me bruisy
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be way smaller, it’s the size of a big peach. At first I had a hard time figuring out how to put it cause I saw on a review that it gave bruises to the person and even though I was super careful it gave me bruises too I got it off and saw some difference but it went away in a minute or two I say buy it but don’t expect great changes. And I mean, it’s better than getting injections or so
customer_reviews.author: Mariana M

customer_reviews.title: Fast effect
customer_reviews.text: It has 3 speed and lips fuller in seconds.It works so good. Safe design It's just a natural effect that happens because you're drawing out moisture when you plump. generally seem to help.. Ahhh Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have no clue what I expected other than the results I got. Make sure to try this when you have no plans to go out in public for a couple days due to the ridiculous “hickeys” it leaves on your lips and around your mouth. I didn’t even have it fully suctioned and only left it on for maybe 10 seconds for 4 times and it left me with black and blue marks around my mouth and deep purple bruises on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lipker

customer_reviews.title: I like the results!
customer_reviews.text: Over all this is a great product. I have used others and this one works. U have to find the right position for a great plump, but it does work!
customer_reviews.author: laneybug

customer_reviews.title: but the results are amazing. In love with this
customer_reviews.text: Takes some time getting used to, but the results are amazing. In love with this!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Samuels

customer_reviews.title: MY LIPS ARE SUPER FAB! 💋
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine yesterday, they are firm/soft & super easy to use! I loved my results with them, they made my lips POP! I’ve never had a product that has worked so well before, it’s definitely worth your money! Buy it!! ☺️🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Christina Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Was way to big for my lips Therefore they kind of made me look like if I was drinking Kool-Aid.....I mean I believe most people would be using theirs if they have small lips and these were made for bigger lips....
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Ehh.
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get used to at first but then its awesome, it works. I use both the round and oval.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: It sucks just as described in the advertising
customer_reviews.text: This bruised the dog snot out of my lips, or more precisely it gave me a mouth hickey. From a distance my lips look gigantic. It did not hurt in the least, but up close I look like fruit punch mouth on a two year old. I’ll try it again once they’ve healed. I just wont let it suck as long. I’m going to have to order a second one for my boyfriend. Boys will be boys...
customer_reviews.author: LoGo

customer_reviews.title: free mirror
customer_reviews.text: I'm 47, and although my lower lip is relatively full, my upper lip has always seemed thin. I open the package today and tried both the oval and the round shapes.Only did them for a few seconds to choose which one match me as I understand you should start with less time to work up to longer sessions of pumping from manual. The results are pretty awesome. Once pump would fill my lips fuller inside. The effect will last longer if i have plumped again. I like the mall mirror,cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ines Hirthe MD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Works as advertised. Lovely presentation, too, in a pretty little red drawstring bag. If you are curious as to how your lips would look with lip filler, this is a fun and inexpensive way to find out! It doesn't last more than an hour, and you have to take the time to read and follow the instructions. It's silly good fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mandel

customer_reviews.title: Will suck your face off once its on right.
customer_reviews.text: If its not making suction that feels like its going to pull your lips off, mess with it and it will. Holy smokes. Just make sure only your lips are in it. It sucked up above my top lip and it left little tiny broken blood vessels. Tiny bruises the size of a needle poke.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reed

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly, It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really does work! Quick and effective. You’ll have full pretty lips in no time. The results are very temporary but it makes such a difference. And... practice makes perfect. Don’t allow the product to go full suction until you’re used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandabeeq

customer_reviews.title: Plump lifts for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! A cheaper version than candy Lipz. 4stars because the padding that goes around the mouthpiece is a joke. I only know that because I used to have a more expensive version.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Desourdis

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this lip plumper it actually works and it pops up your lips nice and big and fluffy the only thing I don’t like about it is that it doesn’t stay plumped up very long
customer_reviews.author: viv

customer_reviews.title: Good for increasing blood flow to lips( just don’t over do it!)
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying this but thought it was worth a try because the lip plumping gloss haven’t worked well and lip injections are expensive. It was a little painful and left some blueing around my lips at first. The more I have used it though the less that has happened. My lips are starting to age, that’s why I tried this. I will say that though the puffy look doesn’t last long(maybe an hour) my lips do look healthier and more like they did when I was younger. I think the increased blood flow is the reason why. I use it for about 60seconds once in the morning and once before bed.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby for a knock off!!👄
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done for a fraction of the price. I really don’t have any other brand to compare it to, but it could use better suction. Nevertheless I’m definitely liking it and it is done whatever you wanted and this is only day one !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No worth it ;
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth it for the price , I'm very disappointed with my purchase. The material is good , ergonomic ,flexible and very hygienic but the suction is terrible it doesn't work at all. I have purchase a different one from Wish for a much cheaper price and it does wonders to my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed! I really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised that this product really works and lasts for hours! The only drawback is that it is very small and firm making it difficult to get your lips inside. It also is slightly painful to use although I'm sure all of these types of plumper are. Definitely works though.
customer_reviews.author: rcaeciliah

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you read the directions there are a lot of ways that you can not only hurt yourself, but bruise around your lips and mouth as well. As far as plumping it has been hit or miss. I know it works really well for a couple of my friends and I have resultes here and there but not consistent. Maybe I just don't wear it long enough, but I think it just depends on the person and how your skin responds.
customer_reviews.author: cowArt19

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and painful
customer_reviews.text: I had the plumper on for about 15 seconds. I read the directions to the t. I applied them correctly. After about 15 seconds, I removed the suction. The plump was there however in the end,I had a bruise the size of Texas, on and around my lips. I will never use this product again. All I can say, is thank goodness for covid and the fact that I have to wear a mask for work!!! A million thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I really gave it a chance. Bruised my lips. Tried it later, more bruising. Tried gentler treatments, but causes redness, minimal plumping. I think this could work for someone, but my skin is to thin, and this just damages my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dupe for Candylipz?
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this instead of the more expensive “apple” brand. Although I’ve never tried the other brand, this works just as I imagine that one would... PLUS with this brand I have the option to use it with or without the lip divider! With the more expensive brand, you’d have to buy 2 different products! $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Leah Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It comes with an instruction manual but i dont use it that way. I just want a slightly plumper top lip. It works and its easy to use. Be careful though, cause it can leave hickey marks around your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Xana

customer_reviews.title: Position the product correctly
customer_reviews.text: This product really does what it says and plumps your lips !!! I love having full lips without the commitment of injections
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: You'll see a difference alright
customer_reviews.text: It worked like it said it was a bit uncomfortable I tried it about 30 seconds at a time. Gave myself a minute break then tried again I was bit surprised when I woke up this bruised and had to go to work. 😂 all I kept thinking of was the line from the movie white chicks YOU WENT FROM CAMERON DIAZ TO JAY Z 🤣 i wish I would have take the picture without the lipgloss So final review IT DOES DO THE JOB just don't go crazy with it maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Janie Torres

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to carry and made of soft silicon, but it won’t stay on without holding and squeezing air out continuously. Also doesn’t plump lips near as big as Candy Lipz.
customer_reviews.author: R & M

customer_reviews.title: It bruised me
customer_reviews.text: The suction is good but maybe that's not the best thing. I read the instructions carefully and it brusied my upper lip. Left a red ring like a hickey on top smh. Good thing I didn't leave it for the whole 2 minutes.! The worst part? My bottom lip got twice as bigger than my top and my top lip is the one I wanted bigger.!! Not happy. My birthday is In 3 days. I hope this goes away!!
customer_reviews.author: jahaziel santiago

customer_reviews.title: This sucks, but doesn’t...
customer_reviews.text: This thing does NOT work. There aren’t any instructions, so I assembled it and used it for 2 minutes and literally saw zero difference, besides the red ring around my lips that were left 🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: J fai

customer_reviews.title: Yeah so
customer_reviews.text: Made my lips 2 inches bigger the first time I used it. Made me look like duck lol had to put ice to bring down the swelling. It also made my lips numb for about 3 hours. But I mean it does work
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lip plumper tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome it definitely works. I usually plump my lips before I go out for a nite out. It usually stays for a couple hours. It also helps you put ur lip liner on better. Honestly from experience only use it for as long as the directions say I did it to long and left a red line around my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not for very small lips or mouths
customer_reviews.text: If your lips are extra small you will have a hard time using this or getting enough suction and when you do you are left with bruises around your whole mouth
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I got scared at first use my lips for super big but it didn’t last long at all prob 2-3 hrs max so far no bruising but if used wrong I think u can bruise up a bit. Over all I like...
customer_reviews.author: federico Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: If your wanting a lip plumper tool this is the one to get!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’m not sure why it has any bad reviews other than misuse of the product. It is so cute and the effects last about an hour or so which is to be expected. Also comes with instructions, it’s pretty user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: madieb

customer_reviews.title: Impulse purchase
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to try one of these out. And now I know, waste of money. I tried it a couple times & didn't really do anything. My puppy got ahold of it & chewed it up. I guess she thought it was a ball. No big loss
customer_reviews.author: SuzyB

customer_reviews.title: It is not very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I mean its alright but it literally keeps your lips big for maybe 20 minutes... It is not very easy to use. My lips never get suctioned properly and it always ends up going to my top lip then I get a huge ring around my lips that lasts for like 3 days, EMBARRASSING.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Puffy lips last all day
customer_reviews.text: Love product This product is very good and fits in the picture, does not disappoint me. make my lips more beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service and super fast shipping. Very detailed information on how to use the product. It definitely works. Be careful with suction possibly causing bruising but if you do it right it will not happen and your lips will look fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made a difference.. no bruising. Better to apply pressure then let go and repeat multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: No joke, It's amazing to me that you can get great plumping that looks natural and pretty for such a small investment. Used it for about 1 minute and 30 se, ycou’re left with beautiful plump lips!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ann Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really feel like it did much except give me a cupping bruise ...
customer_reviews.text: Eh... Didn't really feel like it did much except give me a cupping bruise that lasted 3 days. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Finley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No instructions came with this so not sure how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Undisclosed

customer_reviews.title: small size
customer_reviews.text: I Love this so much! I was impressed that it work !I get to know this from my friend and start to order.It come to me in 2 days.Small tool to fuller lips, always keep in my bag from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Zackery Terry

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to have any long term changes to my lips, but I do seem an improvement for a hour or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: product is also very cute!
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft and comfortable to use. This is much better than any product I have used before. The soft mouth cover tightly seals the full lips and makes the lips more charming. I like the shell and the product is also very cute! Very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Celia Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: It's a little scary
customer_reviews.text: Ok, got to watch this product- it may cause bruising of the lips, or around the lips. Not a problem if you wear dark lipstick and can cover up bruises.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: Results are short lived but works great for a few minutes!
customer_reviews.author: jay-

customer_reviews.title: It yields the same results as the original one, but for a much smaller price tag!
customer_reviews.text: I've actually gotten this for my mom, and she loves it. Sometimes it makes her lips blue temporarily, because of the oxygen depreciation, but otherwise it does what it's meant to!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Lozina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful full lips
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip plumper. I use it usually every time I put a full face of makeup on before applying my lipstick. It is so easy to use and there is a great difference I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Y'ALL THIS WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Y'all this works. I literally ripped the box open because I've been dying to try it and finally pulled the trigger while bored in quarantine and I am livingggg Idk how long it'll last but I'm super happy 💋 If I can figure out how to add photos, I will because wow
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical reading the reviews, but if you apply patience and follow the 10 day instructions this products does its job wonderfully. Max potential plumped lips usually last for an hr or 2. Lips naturally start to look fuller the more consistent you are.
customer_reviews.author: Sienna Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Works great once you figure out how to get the suction right. It takes time to mess with. It doesn't last super long but makes for good pictures. I think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Soft and flexible!
customer_reviews.text: This plump lip is made of environmentally friendly food-grade materials and is a very cute red peach design. Moreover. the silicone lip balm is soft and elastic. exuding a good smell. which is pleasant. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Hansen

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bit big
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lip plumper. Although it is big and heavy makes it Inconvenient sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Coen

customer_reviews.title: Plump
customer_reviews.text: It works when u get it on right. I never used it so I was confused & then realized there's instructions on the bottom lol
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: It works for like an hour.
customer_reviews.text: It chaps your lips so please use a balm before use. The suction is mediocre compared to other brands. It makes your lips bigger for like an hour tops. It is cute though and it fits in my clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler D

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love it, its the best one I have used yet and I have spent quite a bit of money on some but this one is the best also the price is reasonable. Also it came right away , I give it a 5* stars
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: no bruise
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to use this cherry lip plumper. Lovely size and simply use.The strength can be easy adjust and pause, Cause it is manual mode all by hands to press and release it, not any risk by bruise.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Marjorie Leffler

customer_reviews.title: Bruising!!!
customer_reviews.text: So it works really well and makes your lips HUGE, but a little over an hour later they went back to normal size and I have crazy bruising that looks like I ate blue candy all over my lips... maybe it’s just because it’s the first time I used it, not sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I see difference
customer_reviews.text: This cute little owl is the real deal. Photo was taken immediately after use and the results are clear! I will admit it took some patience and a few attempts
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Schuppe

customer_reviews.title: Not for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: Worked, didn’t bruise me, but made me look like a clown. Or like I got stung by a bee, very unflattering for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just received a few days ago so have only used a couple of times. But seems like the more you use it the longer the plump lasts.If you follow the instructions you won’t bruise and it won’t hurt. And the results last a few hours!
customer_reviews.author: Leonel R.

customer_reviews.title: Does not suction
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised this didn’t work. It doesn’t suction at all. I have used many diff ones and this is the first time one didn’t even suction. Maybe I got a dud? Sad
customer_reviews.author: Sami's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Dont work.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not make a difference on my lips other then leaving them hurting and purple I did not see a difference in size.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Solorio

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t grab lips long enough to create lasting pout. Could be operator error, but not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry...
customer_reviews.text: Suction is not good enough, it won’t stay on. Had to returned it.
customer_reviews.author: lilyana

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: No suction. I followed the instructions but it wouldn’t even stay for a minute. Suction was it’s not good.
customer_reviews.author: Mayara Sousa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Of course it gives a little red mark but if you do it befor you put on make up than you can't even notice. But I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it it definitely plumps your lips and if you keep in doing it daily you will notice a difference. It’s pretty big though but I just like that my lips look more full. It’s not super noticeable but is good enough
customer_reviews.author: Nicole barnes

customer_reviews.title: Beware of purple lips the next day!
customer_reviews.text: i plumped my lips yesterday like at 8 pm. It did the job but and i wasn’t bruised at all but when i got to work in the morning i noticed my lips have been purplish the whole time! and it keeps getting worse throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Viri

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like them.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan. If I had tried them out in a timely manner I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Baker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely delivers
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I don’t know how long it’ll last, and right now I feel a bit like a carp, but it definitely works.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Adams

product_meta.title: Lip Plumper Device Beauty Pump Quick Lip Plumper Enhancer Treatment Bigger Mouth Lip Plumping Device
feature_bullets: Really soft material of silicone plump lips with flexible plumpe and not hard plastic piece.Very soft fuller lips and comfortable to use.it wouldn't bruise. You will have candy lips botton/top with makeup.

At first it is make up sucks lips,how to use little cherries, and it has two shape lips, if you suck it too hard your lips will hurt, just suck the air in a little bit and relax stay for a while you will get a pretty lip shape!

Lip enhancers ,the more you use it, the longer and better results you'll get,it is small lips easy for carry or in travel and take out for plumping everytime you want. the result is lips looked too full and the lip color looked wired.

Great alternative to lip fillers! This product, definitely Lipz plumping enhances your lipstick, for a more plumper bigger lips,Love product design, comes with two different lip size. Product works great,and soft enhances your suction lips..
They're cute and easy to clean. dont have tiny lips but they are smaller. This helped plump them and they stayed plump for a couple hours. They didn't bruise/no lip injections like some plumpers do.
